biotools.summary: DSW@IFB is the support service for the development of data management plans in life sciences hosted by the French Bioinformatics Institute (IFB / ELIXIR-FR). It is based on an instance of the Data Stewardship Wizard<https://ds-wizard.org/>  (DSW) tool, a DMP support tool developed by the ELIXIR infrastructure. Access to the DSW@IFB service is free. ELIXIR-FR develops, in collaboration with the other French research infrastructures in Life Sciences, customised DMP models.
